item.title: Relive the Myspace days by adding a favorite song to your Instagram profile

item.description:

item.description:

BeyondMath is working in the field of computational fluid dynamics, which attempts to digitally model how an object moves through water or air. But that’s a lot easier said than done – even with excessive computing […]

item.title: China autonomous vehicle startup WeRide delays US IPO

item.description:

The self-driving tech company aimed to hit the Nasdaq this week, but now says it needs more time to complete the necessary IPO documents.  The firm, which develops autonomous vehicle technology for robotaxis, mini-buses and street sweepers, is seeking an IPO at a $5 billion […]

item.title: Trace Machina is building a simulation testing platform to update safety-critical applications

item.description:

item.title: Dropbox acquires Index Ventures-backed AI scheduling tool Reclaim.ai
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description:
